main.description: List claims. Filterable by: action, provider, receiver, triggeredBy, finished, resourceConformsTo.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

action.description: Filter by action (AT-URI of referenced record).

provider.description: Filter by provider (DID of referenced agent).

receiver.description: Filter by receiver (DID of referenced agent).

triggeredBy.description: Filter by triggeredBy (AT-URI of referenced record).

resourceConformsTo.description: Filter by resourceConformsTo (AT-URI of referenced record).

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
